  • Suggestion Pool
  • View page source

Suggestion Pool¶

Suggestion Pools allow users to enter suggestions of a certain type that are used within the show. Suggestion Pools appear on the home page and menu bar of your Channel so that users can enter suggestions when a Show is created.

Editable Suggestion Pool Fields¶

Name¶

Name is the name of the Suggestion Pool.

Note

Suggestion Pool Names must be a combination of letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores.

Display Name¶

Display Name is the name of the Suggestion Pool that appears to users.

Note

Suggestion Pool Display Names must be a combination of letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores.

Description¶

Suggestion Pool Description appears on the suggestion page of your channel when a show is created, supports Markdown, and is important because it informs the audience on what type of suggestions you want for your show.

Note

Example: If the Suggestion Pool was “Character Titles”, you might ask that users enter an adjective and a noun such as “The lonely programmer”.

User Suggestion Limit¶

User Suggestion Limit limits the amount of suggestions that users can enter for the Suggestion Pool.

Note

If you have a large audience, you may want to make the limit smaller so that more audience member’s suggestions get into your show. If your audience is small, you may want to make the limit higher so that you have enough suggestions to use in your show.

Admin Suggestions Only¶

Admin Suggestions Only makes it so that only your Channel‘s admins can enter suggestions for the Suggestion Pool.

Note

Example: You can use this to set up a Suggestion Pool of the improv teams that participated in your show (like an improv Duel or competitive improv show). This way you can set the teams in advance and let the audience vote on which team won at the end of your show.

Require Login (Premium Only Feature)¶

Require Login makes it so that only users that have logged in can enter suggestions for the Suggestion Pool.

Note

This may make it so less people participate in your show, but it could encourage more users to log into the site which gives you access to more audience member’s e-mails for promoting your show.

Active¶

Active determines whether or not the Suggestion Pool appears on the Vote Type creation page.
